Action.author: tuand
Action.body: sprint 1 closed today. Moved to sprint 2 while work is continuing.

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: Jeff's work is covering me nicely here, and while a set of features in GoConvey would be nice, I have to prioritize other tasks. Will remove from this Sprint and tackle when time permits. We have BDD tests for the Kafka orderer already, so this doesn't affect us one bit.
